import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { StyledSideBar } from '../Style/StyledSideBar' import Button from './Button' import {UserContext} from '../contexts/UserContext' import { faFilter } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function SideBar() { const {userMail} = useContext(UserContext) getName = () =>{ const name = [] for(curr of userMail){ name.push(curr) if(curr == ".") break } return name.join("") } return (
